apps.title: Milanote
apps.description:
Milanote is the tool for organizing your creative projects.

SAVE INSPIRATION & IDEAS
Easily combine notes, images, videos, sketches, and more. Capture anything that fuels your creativity.

ORGANIZE PROJECTS VISUALLY
Bring your ideas, tasks, and references together in one place—so you can see the big picture and the details.

COLLABORATE WITH YOUR TEAM
Milanote boards can be a private place to think, or a shared workspace for collaboration—you control who sees what.

SAVE CONTENT FROM ANY APP
Clip websites, images, and videos from your browser, photos app, or anywhere else—right into Milanote with a tap.

INSTANT SYNCING ACROSS ALL DEVICES
Anything you save to Milanote is instantly synced to all your devices.

The Milanote iPhone & iPad apps also let you…
- Create, view and edit all of your boards
- Upload photos, video & files
- Sketch with Apple pencil
- Get notifications for comments and content updates

apps.title: Food Stylist - Design Game
apps.description:
Welcome to Food Stylist - a relaxing, fun game, where you can plate up amazing virtual food dishes and tablescapes.

Play the role of a Food Stylist as you discover new dishes, rise to the challenge of plating up an amazing scene and capturing incredible food photos.

- Relax and express your creativity in the daily food events.
- Explore different cuisines and plate up delicious dishes.
- Mix and Match - Layout your food and cutlery choices for the best photo possible.
- Vote for your favorite dishes, as submitted by other players.
- See how your designs compare, as voted on by the community!

If you enjoy cooking games or decoration games, or just want to be creative, be sure to download Food Stylist now.

apps.title: FlipaClip: Create 2D Animation
apps.description:
Learn how to Animate Movies with FlipaClip!

Discover Your Unique Animation Style
Dive into the world of animation today! FlipaClip is the perfect platform for beginners and aspiring animators who dream about making animated movies effortlessly.

Easy Tutorials
• Learn with guided how-to content and get Inspired: Access tutorials and join our community for inspiration and guidance.

Powerful and Intuitive Animation Tools
• Art Tools: Use a variety of brushes, lasso, fill, eraser, ruler shapes, mirror tool, and text options. Draw on custom canvas sizes with Apple Pencil support.
• Animation Layers: Animate like a pro with up to 10 layers. Try the Glow Effect and Pixel Effect for free.
• Audio Integration: Add sound effects, voiceovers, and music tracks. Create, add, and edit audio clips across six free audio tracks. Record your own voice for dialogue and import personal audio files. Explore our curated sound effects packages.
• Blur & Smudge Tools: Create stunning effects with these highly anticipated tools..
• Magic Cut AI Tool: Cut out any image or picture with advanced Ai..

Frame-by-Frame Animation Made Simple
• Timeline and Onion Skin: Perfect for precise animation control.
• Frames Viewer and Scrub Control: Ensure a seamless workflow.
• Overlay Grid: Align and frame your drawings accurately.

Personalized Experience
• Dark and Light Mode: Customize your app’s appearance.
• Organize Projects: Stack projects and manage them efficiently.

Stage Customization
• Hide Tools: Create more space for your animations or projects by hiding tools.
• Drag & Rearrange Tools: Customize your layout by dragging and rearranging tool icons for the perfect setup.

Creators Making All Kinds of Animation Styles
Animators are producing animated styles like Cartoons, Memes, Animé, Stick Figures, Stickman, Drawing, Animated Pictures, Stop Motion, Gacha, Gâcha Life, Furry, Sketch, Music Animated Videos, Animals, Fandom, Scribbs or Scribbles on dance videos, and more. Gamers will love creations of Roblox characters, Minecraft, Battle Royale, and others!

Community and Sharing
• Join a Thriving Community: Share your animations with a global audience.
• Participate in Challenges: Win exciting prizes in various contests.
• Social Media Integration: Post directly to TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter/X, Bilibili, Facebook, Tumblr, and more.

Insert Photos & Videos
• Animate on top of images or videos: Create rotoscope effortlessly and drag and drop images on your canvas.

Save and Share
• Multiple Export Options: Save your work as MP4, GIF, or PNG sequences. Post your animated videos to YouTube and TikTok directly from the app.

Watch Animated Shorts
• Streaming Feature: Enjoy a selection of curated animated short movies created by our community..

Join Millions of FlipaClip Creators and share your unique animated stories.

Support and Community
• Website: www.flipaclip.com
• Support: support.flipaclip.com
• Discord: discord.com/invite/flipaclip

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: MocaDeco - Be Creative
apps.description:
You can be creative with MocaDeco!
Apply dramatic filters, cool effects, add eye-catching typography and artworks to your photos.

Overlays
• Over 200 overlays in 16 themes.
• Make your ordinary photos look like vintage film with our various overlays.
• Add a variety of overlays to your images, including rainbows, skies, analog light leaks, grainy film textures and emotional bokeh light effects.

Filters 
• Over 140 unique filters in 12 themes. 
• Capture poetic and surreal photos with our 12 digital infrared filters.
• Deliver bold and striking messages with 21 duotone filters.

Artworks & Fonts
• Select from over 700 artworks & over 150 fonts.
• Fill with glitter and different lovely textures, including gold foils, holographic gradients, marbles and more.
• Adjust the font size, color, line height, letter spacing, alignment and more.
• Make it stand out with drop shadows.

Image Adjustments & More
• Enhance the mood & atmosphere of your photos by applying colored vignettes.
• Brightness, Contrast, Highlight, Shadow, Saturation, Fade, Temperature, Hue, Color Fringe, Prism, Sharpen, Grain.
• The HSL tool gives you control to adjust the Hue, Saturation and Lightness of a specific color in the image.
• Blur images to convey feelings and apply tilt-shift to panoramic shots to make them look like miniatures.
• Crop to 18 different ratios, flip or rotate your photo.
• Correct horizontal and vertical lines as well lens distortions.

Camera 
• Manual controls such as exposure, ISO, shutter speed, and white balance. 
• Apply all filters in live camera mode, allowing you to see your final product before you even tap the shutter button.
• Shoot like a pro using 5 photo composition guide.

Layer and Project Based Editing
• Rearrange the order by long-tapping and dragging to the desired position.
• Lock or hide layers for easier editing.
• Save your work as an editable projects.

Blank Canvas
• Choose from 21 sizes of blank canvases optimized for social media images.
• Add various textures or custom colors.

Don't forget tag your gorgeous edits on Instagram with #mocadeco
Have any questions? Contact us. We welcome your feedback.
Email us at support@mocadeco.com or visit www.mocadeco.com/support

apps.title: Daily Habit & Routine Tracker
apps.description:
Creating healthy habits is easy! Improve yourself with the help of a habit tracker.

Do you often plan ambitious goals, only to give up later? Have you tried repeatedly to introduce healthy habits into your life, but stop working on yourself after only a few days? Now, you can change your life for the better with the help of a habit tracker.

CREATE YOUR FIRST HABIT 
Hooray! You've taken your first step towards change. Create your first habit. Choose any of the ready-made habits or add your own. It's easy: just think of a title, add a motivational phrase, and start moving towards your new life! 

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR PROGRESS
Open your habit card and check your streak to keep track of how well you're doing. There's also a calendar that shows you the days you've missed. 

MAKE PLANS, TAKE STOCK
Set up morning notifications to get your habit plan at the beginning of the day. This will keep you on track and motivated. Evening reminders will help you summarize the day's completed habits.

You can also choose a dark theme for the app. Invite your friends to form healthy habits together.

PREMIUM FEATURES
— Unlimited reminders and repetitions during the day, as well as a daily schedule. Customize your habit to suit your needs and daily routine.
— View detailed statistics about all your habits, such as your current and best habit streak, how many days you've successfully completed your planned habits, and your total number of completed habits.

apps.title: Inspirational Creatives
apps.description:
The Inspirational Creatives app is the simplest and most effective way for you to learn how - and then start your journey towards creating the life you want.

You’ll hear from carefully selected successful artists and creative entrepreneurs, from across the globe, as they share their stories and strategies to help you.

At the touch of a button, access the wisdom, experience and inspiration of those living their creative lives fully, with meaning and purpose.

Gain unique access to a world of exclusive content and all of the benefits of the original podcast series (over 250 episodes) all in one place. These intimate chats will reveal to you what you need to know to take your big ideas and life to the next level.

Whether you want to create a living around a passion, a project based, or simply a wish to live more creatively in the work you enjoy today; the Inspirational Creatives app will support you on your personal and professional journey. 

With short actionable audio content you’ll quickly learn easy-to-implement approaches proven by experts that will inspire you to take your life to the next level - whatever stage you are at.

You’ll hear from writers, producers, videographers, photographers, musicians, marketers, entrepreneurs, business owners, podcasters, coaches, creatives and best-selling authors, who know the territory: what it means to live a creative life.

Hear as they share their own journeys, morning routines and rituals, as well as their best guidance, tactics, tips, and strategies, to help you create the life you want.

Benefits and topics include:

* Positive thinking and creating the life you want

* Finding and supercharging your creative purpose

* Confidence & Self-Esteem

* Finding work you enjoy and identifying new opportunities to expand and grow

* Creating a life and living around your natural passions, abilities and talents

* Managing fear and anxiety

* Daily meditation and morning rituals

* Affirmations and journaling

* The importance of cultivating gratitude

* Happiness, relationships and love

* Law of attraction, alignment and focus

* Productivity and motivation

Download the most inspirational app now.

Then choose from:

BASIC - Zero cost, just sign in.

* A selection of our most popular conversations and actionable content when you sign up

PREMIUM subscription:

* Unlimited use - Listen whenever you want as much as you want

* Unlimited access to the entire audio archive and library

* Download any or all audio tracks for offline use

* Over 120 exclusive interviews featuring successful artists, authors and entrepreneurs

* Over 150 additional short, actionable audio files to enhance your life and living

Premium - Monthly subscription: $9.99/ month

Premium - Yearly subscription: $4.99/ month billed annually at $59.99

You can sign up for a 7 day free trial for either the annual or monthly pass.

Download the app and subscribe now!

• Inspirational Creatives

• Length of subscription: subscribe for a period of one year or one month

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period for the same amount as the initial subscription

• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase

apps.title: Shotlist.
apps.description:
Shotlist allows you to manage your photoshoots in one place. Instead of multiple PDF's, text threads with Inso images, everything is in one place for everyone involved to be on the same page.

With the right structure and process, anything can be made. The vision behind this platform is to innovate and optimize the PROCESS of creative. As a creative, brand or agency, you shouldn't be spending hours on logistics, emails, creating documents, finding old photos but instead be focused on the creative shoot. We are striving to consolidate everything so that you can create.

Note from our Founder:
Hello there!

I'm so excited to have you begin testing our platform! I started as a photographer and this software has been many years in the making. We are currently beta testing the platform and working tirelessly to perfect each feature for an incredible experience so please bear with us if you encounter any issues or bugs. 

Lastly, any feedback is highly valued as your insight helps us create the best possible product! Feel free to reach out on the app or on socials with any feedback or just to say hey! 

Thank you for stopping by, and lets get to creating!

Spencer Davis
Photographer, Storyteller, Founder
@shotlistapp | @spencerdavisphoto

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixed a bug that prevented the entire team to be shown
- Added functionality to invite new team members and edit their role
- Added the ability to build a project

apps.title: Creative Collectibles Toolkit
apps.description:
Everbloom is the ultimate creative toolkit that will transform your content (pictures or videos) into beautiful, digital collectibles.

Take pictures directly from the app or upload your contents from your camera roll and turn them into tickets, membership cards, digital artworks, or trading cards.

Our advanced content editor will push your creativity to another level as you can modify and customize your content to your needs.

Amazing 3D templates at your disposal. 
Turn your 2D content into beautiful 3D creations in seconds by selecting one of the many 3D templates we offer in the app.

Take full ownership of your digital collectibles and find new, meaningful ways to connect with friends, fans, and supporters. 

Offer special perks with your digital collectibles such as signed artwork or photo prints, virtual meet and greet, or other exclusive content—it's entirely up to you.

Build a community of fans or collectors of your digital collectibles and communicate exclusively with them in the Everbloom app.

Share your creations directly to all your favorite social media platforms including Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok, and more. 

Everbloom’s mission is to empower creativity through shared ownership. We cover all the heavy lifting, so you can focus on creating and building your community.

Start your creative journey with Everbloom now!

apps.title: Epson Creative Print
apps.description:
Description
Express your creativity! Print your phone or tablet photos, print directly onto CD/DVDs, create customized greeting cards, personalize stationery and turn your photos into a fun coloring book project.

Key Features
• Collage – Create and print a collage of your favorite photos from your phone or tablet.
• Print on CD/DVDs - Create artwork from your photos and print directly onto an inkjet printable CD or DVD using an Epson printer.
• Coloring Book - Choose a photo and create an outlined coloring book project that you can print and color as a fun project for your kids
• Personal Stationery – Choose between lined templates (such a graph or music paper), calendars or embed your photo as a watermark
• Custom Greeting Cards – Make a personalized greeting card using your photos and personalize it with your own handwriting.
• Design Paper – Choose a favorite pattern and print a design paper that you can use as gift wrapping paper, book cover and more.
• Photo ID – Allows you to print a Photo ID from your mobile device at a custom size and change the background color.
• ID card - You can design your own ID cards and print them on PVC cards.

Printers Supported
See the following website for supported printers.
https://support.epson.net/appinfo/creative/list/en/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Added support for ID card printing (compatible printers only).
- Fixed minor bugs.

apps.title: HowTo - Uniting Creativity
apps.description:
The HowTo app is a social media platform for all things creative! Connect with a fast-growing community filled with like-minded creative people. Explore a wide range of how-tos from Woodworking to Arts and crafts, or embroidery to baking.

Stay up-to-date with projects from your favorite creators or simply discover new ideas for your own projects.

Share What You Love - People are waiting.

Whether you’ve just whittled a spoon or are adding the finishing touches to a victoria sponge; our community can’t wait to see it. The HowTo community has always been at the heart of everything we do; and with the new HowTo app we really are uniting creativity.

Whether you’re just starting a project or have one you’ve finished, you’ll be able to easily share it using our unique platform… We’ve built the tools to be able to share the journey of your project in bite size chunks, essentially creating a story for you followers.

You’ll also be able to upload ‘Snaps’ which is a quick way to share ‘Snappy’ updates without having to upload a whole how-to.

Connect with others.

We’ve made it easy to search for people that you may be already familiar with, or those you’re yet to discover!

Join The Conversation.

We’ve made it easy for you to read or engage with others on topics you care about the most. With our unique commenting system, you’ll even be able to hear or leave voice notes within the comments on each snap or how-to.

Explore creativity.

Creativity comes in all shapes and sizes and with our app we’ve made it easier than ever to discover photos, videos and users based around topics you’re interested in.

Earn Extra Money!

With the HowTo App, you’ll be able to add links showing your followers where they’re able to get the tools or equipment used for your creation. These could be affiliate links meaning you could earn extra money.

We’re also working on additional methods for you to earn extra money. We’re working on a unique platform which will connect you to brands and retailers from around the world, looking to work with creatives like you. More info coming soon.

Download The HowTo App Today!

- Share Videos, Photos and Audio with others.
- Private Messages
- Engage with others via our unique commenting system
- Share How-Tos & Snaps
- Get tailored notifications on account activity
- Connect with others

Whether you're a creator, seller, or side-hustler, this powerful new tool lets your content do more.
Perfect for:

apps.title: Oblique Strategies SE
apps.description:
Unlock Creative Inspiration—Anytime, Anywhere! Oblique Strategies SE helps you overcome creative blocks with powerful prompts and inspiration. Based on the legendary cards by Brian Eno and Peter Schmidt, this app sparks new ideas for artists, writers, musicians, designers, and anyone seeking creativity.

Oblique Strategies is a deck of cards, each with a thought-provoking phrase to break routine thinking and encourage fresh perspectives. This digital edition brings the original and new decks to your fingertips, in a sleek, minimalist style true to the classic design.

Key Features:

• 100+ original and new Oblique Strategies cards
• Minimalist, distraction-free interface
• Daily inspiration with Home Screen widgets
• Works on iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Mac
• Apple Watch app runs independently
• VoiceOver support for accessibility
• Shake your device for a new prompt
• Long tap to repeat the last phrase
• No data collected—privacy first

Whether you’re making art, writing, composing music, or brainstorming, Oblique Strategies SE is your pocket tool for creative breakthroughs.

Download now and unlock your next big idea!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Unlock fresh inspiration — now optimised for iOS 26’s sleek Liquid Glass design.

Interactive Widgets (iOS 17+): Tap your Home Screen or Lock Screen widgets to get instant creative prompts - no need to open the app.
Faster Apple Watch App: Enjoy a more responsive, reliable experience with enhanced sync - your mobile muse for art, design, music and writing.
iOS 26-Ready: Built to leverage Apple’s new Liquid Glass interface and latest tech for an elegant, fluid creative experience.
Polished & Refined: We’ve solved visual glitches, fixed bugs and introduced performance tweaks to make the app faster, cleaner and more inspiring.

Thank you for your creativity and support. Keep breaking blocks.

• Daily inspiration with Home Screen widgets
• Works on iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Mac
• Apple Watch app runs independently
• VoiceOver support for accessibility
• Shake your device for a new prompt
• Long tap to repeat the last phrase
• No data collected—privacy first

Whether you’re making art, writing, composing music, or brainstorming, Oblique Strategies SE is your pocket tool for creative breakthroughs.

Download now and unlock your next big idea!

apps.title: WordPalette
apps.description:
Meet your new muse. Destroy writer's block forever. Escape the beaten path and discover what you *didn't know* you wanted to say.

〰 Bypass your ego and regain your creative spark
 - When experiencing writer's block our own minds can be our worst enemy. 
 - We get caught in the mud, hung up, and mope around in endless ruts, seemingly cursed by an infinite loop of inaction.  
 - But sometimes we've just got to hit refresh, shuffle the deck, ruffle some feathers, evacuate our comfort zones, and sidestep our rituals and habits.
 - When songwriters get stuck -- they switch to a different instrument
 - WordPalette is a different instrument!

〰 Up to six sliding lanes of intelligently scrambled text
 - Short poetic phrases are intuitively grouped and stair-cased across the slider lanes
 - Each lane slides in both directions independently 
 - The phrases are loaded from Palettes (your collected text sources)

〰 Quickly switch between keyboards
 - Simply tap the keyboard button, or swipe left to quickly switch between the slider lanes and the default iOS keyboard
 - You're not just switching between keyboards but between creative states
 - Many workflows are possible : 
 - Rapid-fire between the keyboards, leveraging the "found" inspiration of the sliders with your own creative reactions.
 - Use the sliders to amass a collection of words that resonate with you, then switch to the default keyboard and weave them together.
 - For cut-up method purists: use *only* the word sliders, hunting through the lanes for the perfect compliments and juxtapositions.

〰 Import your favorite text sources and convert them into Palettes.
 - Palettes are converted sources of text used to populate the word sliders.
 - Instantly paste copied text via the Add (+) button on the Palettes page, and convert.
 - You can also import plain .txt files from iCloud Drive and other popular cloud services
 - Alternatively, enable our Share extension to send text from other apps to be converted into Palettes.

〰 Mix and match your Palettes 
 - Activate and deactivate your collected Palettes to control what appears in the word sliders.
 - The word slider keyboard will only pull phrases from currently activated Palettes.
 - Get creative with your combinations! (i.e., text from an article on underwater birth, and an article on the predatory habits of sharks)

〰 Contact
 - https://wordpalette.io
 - dev@wordpalette.io
 - @wordpalettes on Twitter / Instagram

¶

raw_data.releaseNotes:
FIXES
- Fixed launch crash reported by some users running iOS 13

ENCHANCEMENTS
- Refreshed app tint colors
- Updated AppStore screenshots

¶

apps.title: Moji Edit- Avatar Emoji Maker
apps.description:
#1 Emoji App with 10 million users!

Ever wished you had your own custom emoji? NOW, you can with Moji Edit! With over 1500 choices, you’ll be able to create your ultra personalized, 100% custom emoji. 

QUICK FACE SCAN

- Take a selfie and your emoji is created in seconds. 

IMPORT PHOTO 

- Upload a photo in our Face Scan mode and your emoji is created in seconds. Look for the photo upload button on the top right hand corner. 

3D MOJI & AVATAR MAKER

- Now you can create your moji in TWO different styles: 3D and 2D looks. Create your expressive emoji in 3D or cartoon avatar version of yourself. 

CUSTOM EMOJI

- With 1000's of hairstyles, hats, glasses, makeup, color options and many more fun accessories, you can be whoever you want!

LIVE AR MODE

- With your custom 3D moji, you can make your own AR face filter and record your animated moji in real-time. Make super cool videos using your camera and share them with your friends!

MOJI STICKERS

- With 1000's of different stickers and expressions for every mood and occasion, this app allows you to take your texting game to a whole new level. 

- Access and use your emoji stickers in iMessage, WhatsApp, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and many other apps.

FEATURES: 

+ Instant Emoji Maker with Face Scan feature. 
+ Automatic Moji Maker using photo import advanced technology. 
+ Live AR mode to record your moji in real-time. 
+ Lots of editing tools to customize your moji. 
+ Over 1500 choices to make your avatar look just like you!
+ 1000's of moji stickers, all featuring you!
+ A huge collection of special stickers for every mood & every occasion. 
+ Share and send your emoji directly from your keyboard.

Instagram.com/mojiedit
fb.me/mojiedit 
Twitter.com/MojiEdit
Press- info.mojiedit@gmail.com

If you have any feedback or questions, please contact us on info.mojiedit@gmail.com

Subscription options:
- You can subscribe to unlimited access for pro features including unlimited avatars, exclusive emoji content and tons of outfits and accessories. 
- Moji Edit+ offers unlimited usage and unlocks all features and removes ads for $49.99* yearly. You may choose to subscribe with a three day free trial or otherwise subscribe with no free trial. 
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at the confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that content.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
* This price is for United States customers. Pricing may differ depending on your country and actual charges may be
converted to your local currency of residence. The prices are equal to “Apple’s App Store Matrix” which determines the equivalent subscription price in USD. 

Questions? Ask: info.mojiedit@gmail.com

Links to our Terms and Privacy Policy can be found below:
Terms: https://www.mojiedit.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://www.mojiedit.com/privacy-policy/

NOTE:
All content, resources and designs contained in the Moji Edit application are the sole property of Double Trouble Creatives and are protected under copyright and intellectual property laws. Any unauthorised use or breach of our copyright may result in legal consequences.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We have a big update today! Woohoo, Moji Edit 3.0 is now available! This version brings a ton of awesome improvements, focusing specifically on a major user interface redesign to enhance your experience of the app. Creating your moji is even more enjoyable, frictionless and smooth, especially paired with all the new feature improvements we've made for you. So without further ado, here is all the great things you'll find:

- A new interface optimized for both Light and Dark mode.
- An improved create mode experience with better categorization.
- A much better categorization of stickers.
- A new favorites category, where you can easily access your most loved stickers.
- A new home for your Draft mojis.
- An all new Moji Cam mode, where you can easily access your moji creations and make awesome videos.
- An all new Moji Merch mode with an improved shopping experience.
- A new navigation bar and quick access for most used touch points. 
- And let's not forget you can also use our Moji Widget for more entertaining chats.

Next update is coming soon, so stay tuned! Thank you for supporting our app.

apps.title: Life Lapse Stop Motion AI
apps.description:
Stop Motion by Life Lapse lets you create your own stop motion movies and animations at home. 
- Create stunning stop motion animations with ease.
- Download, share, and post to Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and other social media.
- 4.8/5 from 35,000+ ratings in the App Store, App of the Day in 2024 and 2021. 

Unleash your creativity with Life Lapse: the ultimate EASY stop motion maker. Craft captivating animations, from mesmerizing stop motion to engaging social media content that will stop the scroll. Download Life Lapse now and experience stop-motion animation like never before. 

Our Features:
~ Stop Motion Camera: Shoot and film in 4K UHD resolution with our ghost overlay and hands-free tools like an interval timer
~ Stop Motion Editor: Life Lapse auto-stitches everything for you, making the stop motion process quick and easy
~ Easy to use + beginning friendly: Intuitive interface for all animators, even a beginner!
~ Stop Motion tutorials: dozens of tutorials to learn different stop motion techniques
~ Blend stop motion with live action from a single shot! Select "Life Lapse" project to shoot truly magical videos by using layers & masking. 
~ Edit stop motion videos in seconds! 20+ Pro editing on-click stop motion tools (freeze, boomerang, reverse, filters and re-align after you've shot & more)
~ Easy to animate perfectly with our ghost/onion skin layer in camera. See your previous photo so you know how to move your animation next.
~ Add music and sound effects: Add and change the music soundtrack and sounds in your video.
~ Filters to make your video look amazing: Add video filters to control how your video looks and feels.
~ Easy to share on Social Media: Easily prepare your videos for Instagram or TikTok using our built-in guidelines.
~ Make your animations looks smooth and professional: Speed controls help make your animations smooth and silky!
~ Download to your phone: Save videos to your phone so you can send them to friends and family. 

Try PRO for Free:
If you want to make more professional animations, experience the best stop-motion tool that is made for video content creators for FREE with a 7-day trial. After the 7 days is up, unless canceled before the 7 days, you will get access to Life Lapse with the annual subscription rate.


Find us on Instagram/TikTok and share your work!
See how others are using Life Lapse on Instagram at @LifeLapse_App or by searching #LifeLapse. We also feature Life Lapse video creators on our Instagram. For a chance to have YOUR stop motion videos featured share your Life Lapse video on Instagram & tag #LifeLapse or @LifeLapse_App.

Send us your Feedback - support@lifelapseapp.com
Have some feedback for us? Suggestions for new features? Or maybe just some questions on how to use the app? We’d love to hear from you! E-mail us at support@lifelapseapp.com with any questions and feedback you have and we’ll answer within 48 hours.



Privacy Policy & Terms & Conditions: https://www.lifelapseapp.com/legal

apps.title: Reflect: Creative Sparks
apps.description:
Reflect: Creative Sparks is a minimalist creativity companion designed to break habitual thought patterns.

With a single tap, discover a fresh, thought-provoking prompt drawn from a collection crafted to inspire reflection, perspective-shifting, and spontaneous ideas.

Use Reflect when you’re stuck, curious, or need a nudge toward the unexpected. Whether you’re an artist, writer, thinker, or just someone who enjoys thoughtful design, Reflect invites you to slow down and see differently.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What’s New in Version 1.1

• Expanded prompt library with dozens of fresh, perspective-shifting sparks
• Enhanced iPhone experience with smoother toast transitions
• Stronger haptic feedback on Apple Watch for a more tactile experience
• Brand-new Apple TV app for lean-back creative inspiration
• Sync refinements and visual polish across all platforms

Let Reflect meet you wherever inspiration strikes.

apps.title: ERIC: Creative Career App
apps.description:
Get access to a career in the creative industries
- Thousands of opportunities
- Hundreds of helpful resources
- New stuff posted daily
- All over the UK
- Completely free

The perfect app for 16-25 year olds who want to explore a career in the creative industries - find everything you need to get a foot in the door. And it’s completely free!

Interested in working in the creative industries? Not sure how to gain the right skills, get industry experience or build useful networks? This is the app for you. 

-------------------------

What opportunities can I find on the app?
With 10,000+ creative careers opportunities on the ERIC app, you have everything you need in one place:
Full time/part time jobs
Freelance gigs
Internships
Apprenticeships
Training programmes
Bootcamps
Free courses
Workshops
Events
Mentoring schemes
Accessibility initiatives
Competitions
Grants/Funding
Helpful creative careers content
& many more upskilling opportunities

-------------------------

Which creative industries does the app cover?
Advertising
Marketing
PR
Art
Craft
Design
Fashion
Film
TV
Gaming
Social media
Content creation
Music
Podcasts
Radio
Audio
Photography
Videography
Publishing
Theatre
Comedy
Dance
Performing Arts
Writing
Journalism
VFX
Animation
Culture
Heritage

-------------------------

Is it only for people in London?
No. The app provides opportunities for young people all over the UK. You will be matched up with things in your local area when you sign up for the app, and you can browse everything that’s fully-remote or open to people UK-wide.

-------------------------

Why is it worth downloading?
Because we know what you want and need - we’ve been there. The founders of the app Mae and Sam tried to get into the creative industries and didn’t know how to get their foot in the door or where to go for help. So they created ERIC to solve the problem! The ERIC team gather all the careers support and opportunities other people are posting across the internet and bring it all onto the app - so you never have to worry about where to find stuff every again. We’ve found it all for you. 

-------------------------

Don't just take our word for it, hear how ERIC has helped other young people:
“I used to spend hours looking for events & internships in the creative industries. I’d have hundreds of tabs open. ERIC does the searching for me.”
“I love how I can filter for different creative industries and save opportunities for later when I have more time. This is a game-changer. ”
“I can't believe how many creative opportunities there are in my area. I've already found a local training scheme that will give me the experience I need.”

-------------------------

apps.title: Being Creative
apps.description: Our research and experience shows that an individual with a Creative Operating System exhibits a certain mindset and heartset that contribute to their Being Creative. In our work with organizational leaders, educators, and entrepreneurs we find that one of the skills that sets leaders who create impact apart is creativity. The activities in this app were designed to facilitate the reawakening of the individual as a creative leader. By working on a single skill at a time or by combining activities from several skills, a creative leader can develop the habit of creative thinking which will lead to innovation and results.

apps.title: Nine Ideas: Build Creativity
apps.description:
Train your creativity in small, daily steps.
Choose a topic – and write down nine ideas.
Challenging, but doable. A daily routine that gets easier over time – and builds real creative strength.

Whether it’s for journaling, brainstorming, or daily inspiration – Nine Ideas gets your thoughts moving.
You’ll explore new angles, train your idea flow, and strengthen your creative mindset.

No pressure. It’s not about being perfect.
It’s about thinking differently, experimenting, and showing up every day.

—————————

How it works:
→ Pick a topic – or get one at random
→ Write nine ideas, thoughts or questions
→ Train your thinking in a clear, simple format
→ Revisit topics, save favorites, explore new angles

—————————

Why nine ideas?
Because nine is just outside your comfort zone.
Enough to stretch your mind – but still doable.
That’s what makes it work.

—————————

In a world of AI and automation, your ability to think creatively matters more than ever.
Your questions, your ideas, your way of thinking – they make the difference.

Nine Ideas helps you create a habit of thinking clearly, creatively, and consistently.
Offline. Without pressure. One small step at a time.

—————————

Who is it for?
→ You want to think more clearly, work more creatively, or reflect regularly?
→ You’re looking for daily prompts to spark new ideas in your work, studies, or personal life?
→ You use journaling, develop personal projects, or create content?
→ You’re navigating change and want to build a habit of creative reflection?
→ Do you prefer structured thinking, think in connections, and want to strengthen your creativity – in your own way?

Nine Ideas helps you stay consistent – with structure, inspiration, and a format that activates your mind.

—————————

What you’ll gain:
→ More mental clarity and focus
→ New ideas and creative breakthroughs
→ Confidence in your own process
→ A simple habit to strengthen your creativity
→ A space to think – your way

And if you don’t reach nine?
That’s okay. Some days you’ll have nine. Some days, just a few.
What matters is: you showed up.

—————————

Your ideas stay on your device.
No account, no cloud, no tracking. Just you and your mind.

—————————

Start your daily challenge today.
Creativity isn’t a talent. It’s a habit.

No pressure. It’s not about being perfect.
It’s about thinking differently, experimenting, and showing up every day.

—————————

How it works:
→ Pick a topic – or get one at random
→ Write nine ideas, thoughts or questions
→ Train your thinking in a clear, simple format
→ Revisit topics, save favorites, explore new angles

—————————

Why nine ideas?
Because nine is just outside your comfort zone.
Enough to stretch your mind – but still doable.
That’s what makes it work.

—————————

In a world of AI and automation, your ability to think creatively matters more than ever.
Your questions, your ideas, your way of thinking – they make the difference.

Nine Ideas helps you create a habit of thinking clearly, creatively, and consistently.
Offline. Without pressure. One small step at a time.

—————————

Who is it for?
→ You want to think more clearly, work more creatively, or reflect regularly?
→ You’re looking for daily prompts to spark new ideas in your work, studies, or personal life?
→ You use journaling, develop personal projects, or create content?
→ You’re navigating change and want to build a habit of creative reflection?
→ Do you prefer structured thinking, think in connections, and want to strengthen your creativity – in your own way?

Nine Ideas helps you stay consistent – with structure, inspiration, and a format that activates your mind.

—————————

What you’ll gain:
→ More mental clarity and focus
→ New ideas and creative breakthroughs
→ Confidence in your own process
→ A simple habit to strengthen your creativity
→ A space to think – your way

And if you don’t reach nine?
That’s okay. Some days you’ll have nine. Some days, just a few.
What matters is: you showed up.

—————————

Your ideas stay on your device.
No account, no cloud, no tracking. Just you and your mind.

—————————

Start your daily challenge today.
Creativity isn’t a talent. It’s a habit.

apps.title: coCreator Society
apps.description:
coCreator Society is a community app designed for creative professionals to connect, learn, and collaborate.


Inside the app, you’ll find:

•Events & Workshops – Join live and virtual sessions to grow your skills and stay inspired.

•Discussion Spaces – Participate in focused conversations on strategy, operations, content, and more.

•Member Directory – Browse creative pros across roles like strategists, OBMs, community managers, and designers.

•Messaging & Chat – Connect directly with peers to collaborate or share ideas.

•Visibility Opportunities – Access spaces to showcase your work, respond to project requests, and grow your network.


The app is built for creative business owners who want a supportive space to share resources, celebrate milestones, and discover new ways to grow. Whether you’re just getting started or scaling your business, coCreator Society gives you the tools and connections to keep moving forward.

apps.title: PhotoFi: Share Your Creativity
apps.description:
Unleash Your Creativity with PhotoFi!
PhotoFi is the perfect app for creatives who want to share their passion with the world! Post your favorite moments with friends and family, showcase your photographs, artwork, and graphic designs, and connect with a vibrant community of like-minded creators. Stay motivated with fan donations and discover new talented artists every day!

CONNECT AND SHARE

Create a profile and start sharing your experiences and creations.
Grow your following and go live to engage with your audience.
Chat with friends, family, and fellow creatives worldwide.
Earn fan donations with a Creator badge and build a loyal community.

INSPIRE & BE INSPIRED

Share your work, from photos and illustrations to any creative project.
Keep your followers updated with story posts.
Discover fresh talent and creative content on your feed.

FOR ANYONE WHO WANTS TO SHARE

Perfect for photographers, video makers, editors, and creatives.
Network with other artists and attract potential clients and collaborators.
Join artistic communities and connect with people who appreciate your work.

FEATURES

Image & Video Feed – Stay updated with content from people you follow.
Discover Page – Find talented creators and small business owners.
Stories – Share pictures and videos that disappear in 24 hours.
Donation Icon – Receive fan support with a Creator badge.
Live Stream – Connect with your followers and earn donations.
Chat – Privately message friends and followers.
Profile – Create a profile and link to other socials.

SHARE AND GO VIRAL

Post your favorite memories and creative work on PhotoFi! Engage with your audience through stories and live streams, build a loyal following, and receive donations when you have a Creator badge. Download PhotoFi today and start sharing your creativity with the world!

Download PhotoFi now and go viral!

apps.description:
Lyvia: AI Art & Video Studio

Unleash your imagination with Lyvia, the AI-powered creative studio in your pocket.
Turn your ideas into breathtaking artworks, characters, and short videos, all with the power of your words and imagination.

Whether you’re an artist, writer, designer, or dreamer, Lyvia helps you visualize anything you imagine.
From vibrant concept art to serene landscapes, from character portraits to animated moments, Lyvia makes your ideas visible.

Why creators love Lyvia:
• AI Image Generation: Describe what you imagine and watch it appear in seconds. Detailed, artistic, and pleasing to the eye.
• AI Video Creation: Turn words into short, expressive videos that move and tell your story.
• Custom Styles: Personalize your results with artistic filters and stylistic controls.

With Lyvia, you don’t just generate images. You create experiences.
It’s where ideas evolve, stories take shape, and imagination has no limits.

Start creating with Lyvia today and see how far your imagination can go.

apps.title: Byte Vine Creative Meme Maker
apps.description:
Byte and Vine Meme Maker lets you unleash your creativity by re-living the best moments of Vine, and exploring the new world of Byte!

*Over 4 MILLION Users* have tried the original version of the app, but we listed to user feedback and added the best of looping videos from Vine and are constantly scouring the Internet to find more!

With Byte Vine Creative Meme Maker which used to be called Make a Meme+ you can easily create awesome memes on the go using your iOS device! Pick a meme from "Forever alone" to "Success Kid" and many more. Use this app to create memes and send to your friends!

Features:
- Frequent updates to app content
- Pick from a selection of awesome memes including "Overly Attached Girlfriend" and "Grumpy Cat"
- Easily change text at the touch of a button
- Add hats and faces to your memes and pictures like the "Scumbag Hat" and "Troll Face"
- Save the image to your camera roll
- Post your meme to Facebook
- Post your meme on Instagram
- Tweet your meme
- Share your meme with an email
- Copy your meme to the clipboard with a direct link to the Messages app so you can text your meme to your friends!
- Assign your meme to one of your contacts
- Use your own pictures! Either take a picture or use one from your library
- Use Know Your Meme to learn about different memes
- Many more memes available through in-app purchase!

You can upgrade to the Premium version to get frequent content updates and remove any ads.
Choose from different Premium subscription options:
• Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew to a paid subscription. You can cancel your subscription in the iTunes settings at least 24-hours before the end of the free trial period. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term.
• Choose from several subscription options.
The standard subscription options are:
1 week Subscription with 3 day free trial
1 month Subscription
1 year Subscription
• Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.
• You can cancel a free trial or subscription anytime by cancelling your subscription through your iTunes account settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.


Terms of use: https://pavementapps.com/tos.html
Privacy Policy: https://pavementapps.com/privacy.html

If you enjoy the app, please post a positive review, if you hate the app, please email us and let us know what we can do to improve your experience with Byte Vine Creative Meme Maker

Ideas Become Habit! My idea note, 'Abang'!

Creativity is not inherent, it is cultivated. 'Abang' continually stimulates creative thinking with a new keywords every day, helping to turn your ideas into reality.

Key Features:
1. Spark Creativity With Random Keywords: Embrace a new keyword provided each day to spark ideas. This offers opportunities to unleash your creativity, from everyday moments to major projects.

'Abang' is here to help you gradually make creativity a habit. Download 'Abang' now and start your creative journey!

apps.title: AMUZN - Creative Talent
apps.description:
Your home to discover and purchase personalised creative services in an easy, fun & secure way.

Developed by-for-and-with creatives, bringing the creative world to all!

Amuzn connects local creative talent with customers worldwide seeking to purchase their customizable creative service offerings on demand through the app, complete with an engaging user experience that enables social interaction and content sharing.

On Amuzn, customers can find and transact on a wide range of creative services from local artists, musicians, performers, photographers, filmmakers, writers and other creatives around the world.

Join our Amuzn community in building the world's leading destination to discover, connect and hire creative talent!

We’ve developed an end-to-end frictionless creative services marketplace designed for ease of use, even for those who may not be tech-savvy. On the platform both creatives and customers can easily create profile pages to showcase their work, connect directly with each other, and transact on creative service offerings straight through the app.

Creative service offerings form part of the artist’s profile and come complete with the artist’s pre-defined scope, delivery time, price, personalisation options and associated photos/video posts. This facilitates for Customers the discovery of creative services offerings of interest for on demand purchase, either through a profile/service search or by browsing in an entertaining way the engaging artist posts and profile pages across the diverse creative categories.

Amuzn is here for YOU, empowering all CREATIVES and their CUSTOMERS!

For CREATIVES –
Showcase your work, talent and creativity... Amuzn gives you control so you can be empowered to create your way.
• Define your service offering, pre-set your price, time, and customisation options
• Communicate directly with customers
• Be in control of your work & agenda
• Get paid fast, easily & securely

For CUSTOMERS –
Made for all in search of inspiring local creative talent... Amuzn is transparent and barrierless, empowering you to purchase directly creative services easily for your entertainment, sharing or events.
 • Access to creative services on-demand
 • Clear pricing, scope, time, quality
 • No hassle, bidding or negotiation
 • Secure & easy in-app transaction

DISCOVER exciting on-demand creative services, CONNECT with the diverse talent who create them, and get your own, personalised for YOU

AMUZN | CREATIVITY. MADE, SHARED, EXPERIENCED - YOUR WAY.

www.amuzn.com

apps.title: Whimsea: Cozy Creative Timer
apps.description:
Whimsea – Your Gentle Companion in Creative Moments

Whimsea is a cozy, mood-inspired app created for artists, writers, designers, photographers, and anyone who loves crafting beauty with their own hands. No stress, no pressure, just gentle encouragement, soft reminders, and delightful rewards that turn your daily creative sessions into moments of joy.

  Mood-Inspired Creativity
Whimsea meets you exactly where you are. Choose your mood and creative activity, and get personalized prompts that gently guide you into your creative flow. Whether you’re feeling joyful, thoughtful, or calm. Whimsea has just the right inspiration for you.

  Simple, Beautiful Timers
No distractions, no complicated planners. Just elegant and intuitive timers designed for creative minds. Choose between a simple timer or a Pomodoro-style session to structure your creative time gently and effectively.

  Playful Achievements & Rewards
Every completed creative session brings you charming achievements and exclusive rewards like beautifully designed wallpapers for your phone. Celebrate every small step of your creative journey, making each moment feel special.

  Musical Themes to Inspire
Set the perfect ambiance for your creativity with Whimsea’s built-in collection of calming, inspiring musical themes. Each theme helps you dive deeper into your imagination, enriching your creative process.

   Designed with Care and Warmth
Whimsea is not just an app—it’s a warm, inviting space designed to inspire creativity through comfort and gentle motivation. It encourages you to express your mood, share your creative spirit, and find joy in everyday moments.

   Why Whimsea?
	•	Stress-free Creativity: No pressure or overwhelming productivity tools, just gentle encouragement.
	•	Personalized Inspiration: Tailored tasks based on your current mood.
	•	Delightful Rewards: Achievements and charming wallpapers to celebrate your creativity.
	•	Aesthetic Simplicity: Beautiful design, intuitive interfaces, and soothing musical themes.

Whimsea invites you to discover creativity without stress, turning every moment into a small celebration.

Download Whimsea today and let your creativity gently unfold.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New update!
Shining Brighter: Whimsea New Design + Creative Calendar.


– A brand-new design: light, beautiful, and unified, every session feels inspiring from the very first glance.
– Meet the Calendar (v.1), your personal diary of creativity: track active days, your mood, and see how your time flows between different creative paths.
– Rewards now feel even smoother and more joyful, because every achievement deserves a little celebration.

apps.title: Plot — your creative hub
apps.description:
Plot is a creative hub for social media marketers and creators who are always on the move and creating. It's one place to store, source, and share ideas and assets wherever you are, because let's face it — our work sometimes lives beyond our desks.

We're a creative hub that embraces the mess. Dump ideas or upload media files without worrying about file name and our AI magically handles the organization for you. Search using visual memory, just like your brain does.

Never again let your ideas slip away or lose files in the shuffle. Bring your ideas to life with Plot.

raw_data.description:
Dostoevsky said that beauty will save the world.

Padlet offers beautiful boards and canvases for visual thinkers and learners. Use boards to collect, organize, and present anything. Use sandboxes for whiteboarding, lessons, and activities.

Over 40 million people every month actively use Padlet around the world. Here are some of the ways they use it:

-Create interactive lessons
-Design collaborative worksheets
-Brainstorm ideas
-Make slideshows
-Build meeting agendas
-Solicit feedback
-Collaborate on files with clients
-Store instructional videos
-Share marketing assets
-Manage real-estate listings on a map
-And more

Dostoevsky would have loved Padlet.

apps.title: Creative States
apps.description:
Creative States is a chain of business coworking spaces with an all-inclusive service: from modern offices to an active business community that helps you grow and find new opportunities. Here you can not only work effectively, but also meet people, develop your project, and be part of a strong community.



At Creative States locations you will find:

- Offices for teams
- Open space for freelancers 
- Meeting and Skype rooms 
- Lounge areas, kitchen with chefs, bar and showers
- Event zones for your events 
- Generator, shelter
- Free events, networking and active business community


What does the app give you?


- All 6 Creative States locations in your smartphone

- Booking a rate, renting meeting and Skype rooms
- Main news and event announcements - sign up in a few clicks
- Shop with merchandise, certificates, personalized cards and useful products
- Special benefits from partners (discounts on beauty, food, education, entertainment services, etc.)
- Opportunity to meet new people and develop networking among residents


Creative States: Office for work. A community for development. An atmosphere for inspiration.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We regularly update the app with new features, bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Better markdown support
- Monthly calendar view for events
- Brivo in-app unlock
- Klarna

apps.title: Artsy: Sketch & Write
apps.description:
Creativity works like a muscle, if you work on it, it will grow! Develop your creativity and drawing skills with reusable cReATivit:)y pages.

Subscribe to unlock all sketch packs and enjoy the first week for free, then pay only $49.99/year.

Each pack contains different kinds of exercises to practice with. Relieve stress and color mandalas, practice calligraphy, paint masterpieces from famous artists, or draw on a blank canvas.


Choose from a variety of categories depending on your mood:

-Inkblots
-Mannequins: Fashion Design
-Mandalas
-Learn to Draw: Step by Step
-Color Block: Fill in the Blank
-HerStory: Female Role Models
-Masterpieces: Famous Paintings
-Calligraphy and Cursive
-Learn Chinese: Animals in Mandarin


**Supports Apple Pencil for iPad Pro and 3D Touch sensitivity for iPhones**

Features:
-Tons of unique activities added daily
-Choose from a variety of categories including: mandalas, role models, fashion design, travel, complete the picture, famous artists and paintings, inkblots, calligraphy, Chinese letters, and more
-Print option to proudly display your artwork at home
-Recently sketched page so your in-process artwork is always available
-A rich color palette
-Personal portfolio of all of your saved drawings and exercises


SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
-Artsy offers an auto-renewing yearly subscription at $49.99/year to provide you unlimited access to the Artsy Collection while you maintain an active subscription
-You can cancel anytime during the trial period – there is no cancellation fee.
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
-The subscription is automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
-The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and automatic renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Apple ID Settings after purchase
-Cancellation will not go into effect until the end of the billing cycle
-All prices are subject to change at any time. Promotional discounts cannot be applied retroactively to existing subscriptions.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tinytap.it/site/privacy/
Terms & Conditions: https://www.tinytap.it/site/terms_and_conditions/

raw_data.releaseNotes: In the newest version, we said adios to some tiny bugs so that they won't bother you again!

apps.title: docrafts Creativity Magazine
apps.description:
docrafts® Creativity is the UK’s biggest and best selling craft magazine. Each issue is bursting with crafting inspiration, techniques and top tips on a wide range of crafting activities. Whether it’s card making, scrapbooking, jewellery making or baking Creativity has it covered.

Whatever your level of crafting experience Creativity has the project that’s right for you with handy step by step guides for the perfect make. Each issue also offers exclusive competitions, giveaways, information on the latest hot products, reader galleries and much more.

----------- 

Paid for app downloads include one issue of the user’s choice. Free app downloads come with no free issue unless otherwise stated. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues. 
Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the next released issue. 

Available subscriptions are: 

6 months: £10.99/ US$15.99 (3 issues) 
12 months: £19.99/ US$28.99 (6 issues) 

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product. 
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period. 
-Payment will charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased. 
Bundles of single issues can be also be bought within the application. To use purchased credits, simply click on the issue price and select ‘use credit’. This allows you to purchase back issues at reduced prices. 

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account. 

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. 
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store 

Help and frequently asked questions be accessed in-app and on pocketmags. 
If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com 

-------------------- 

You can find our privacy policy here: 
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx 

You can find our terms and conditions here: 
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Improved reading experience
iPhone X support
Bug fixes and other improvements

**We always love to hear your feedback. If you have any comments or queries please contact us at help@pocketmags.com**

apps.title: Creative Writing: Unprompted
apps.description:
Swipe through our library of hundreds of writing prompts to find the perfect start to your story!

Turn on the new focus mode to keep you engaged with your writing

Anyone on a newer device will have access to our new writing feedback system, to help coach you on your journey!

Whether you are a beginner looking to try something new, or a seasoned professional wanting to break their writer’s block, we have something for you. With a growing list of genres and prompts behind us, you’re sure to find something you’ll love.

We’ve got prompts that will work for your next project, be it a screenplay, poem, or a heroic fantasy.

Our lightweight app makes it easy for you to get anywhere. On your commute, or even just on your lunch break. We try to keep the friction as low as possible so you can build a solid writing habit quickly.

When you are ready to share your work with the world, Unprompted makes that easy too. You can share your stories whenever you like with the click of a button.

Unprompted is designed to help you break through writer's block and discover new ideas. Let your creativity soar—download Unprompted and start your next adventure today!

The Unprompted Access subscription keeps things as simple as possible. One subscription, unlimited prompts, unlimited feedback, no restrictions

Otherwise take it easy with our 3 free prompts and one free piece of feedback each day

Unprompted Terms: https://whiostudios.com/unprompted-terms
Apple Standard Terms of Use (EULA) - https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Lists for Writers
apps.description:
Lists for Writers is a great addition to any writer’s toolbox. Helpful to both novice and expert writers alike, this app delivers list after list of prompts and ideas for your brainstorming sessions: names, character traits, plot lines, occupations, obsessions, action verbs, and much more! Whether you are working on a creative writing project, a short story, an essay assignment, National Novel Writing Month / NaNoWriMo, or your next fiction book, this app helps get it done.

NEW! Support for multitasking on the iPad!

Shuffle and search features! You can now search any list as well as randomly shuffle lists and search results!

Includes dictionary support so you can look up most words without leaving the app. 

Includes a Notepad feature where you can collect any interesting list items for your writing, edit them, and email or print your notes. 

Featured in Slate magazine and The New York Times!

* * * * *  "perfect to browse for inspiration" - Cult of Mac

Lists included:
* Character - Naming
  - First Names (male and female) 
  - Last Names
  - People/Roles
  - Nonhuman Characters
* Character - Physical Characteristics
  - Body Types
  - Facial Characteristics
  - General Physical Characteristics
  - Skin and Complexion
  - Hair
  - Clothing
* Character - Occupations
  - Modern
  - Archaic
* Character - Milestones
  - Anniversaries
  - Birthstones
  - Birth Flowers
  - Zodiac
* Personality - Thoughts
  - General Characteristics
  - Phobias
  - Philias
  - Obsessions
  - Wisdom
  - Belief Systems
  - Emotions
* Personality - Behaviors
  - Character Traits
  - Bad Habits
  - Hobbies
  - Super Powers
* Plot
  - Seven Basic Plots
  - Thirty-six Dramatic Situations
  - Conflicts
  - Issues
* Setting - Geographical
  - Cities (U.S. and World)
  - Landforms
* Setting - Countries by Continent
  - Africa
  - Antarctica
  - Asia
  - Australia
  - Europe
  - North America
  - South America
* Setting - Other
  - Forms of Government
  - Encounter Locations
  - Archaic Locations
  - Futuristic Locations
  - Modern Locations
  - Weather
* Genres
  - Fantasy, Myths, and Magic
  - Divination and Fortune Telling
  - Ecclesiastical
  - Holidays
  - New Age
  - Nautical
  - College Teams
  - Sciences and Studies
  - Scientific Instruments
  - Military Terms
  - Military Acronyms
*Miscellaneous
  - Animals (Domesticated)
  - Animals (General)
  - Animal Sounds
  - Colors
  - Color Values
  - Foods
  - Vehicles
  - Feeding and Eating
  - Textiles
  - Halloween
  - Thanksgiving
  - Christmas
  - Forms and Shapes
  - Units of Measurement
  - Carriages and Chariots
  - Fighting and Combat
  - Dance Styles
  - Bearing
  - Causation
* Words - Grammar
  - Action Verbs
  - Dialog Verbs
  - Nouns
  - Prepositions
  - Adjectives
  - Adverbs
  - Verbs
  - Common Misspellings
  - Transitional Words and Phrases
  - Word Terms
* Words - Fun
  - Rhyming Words
  - Gadzookery
  - Nonsense
  - Triples
  - Aussie Slang

*****

PRIVACY DISCLOSURE

Lists for Writers:

- Does not collect or share any personal data
- Does not contain any ads
- Does not contains in-app purchases
- Does include links to the Thinkamingo web site, Facebook page, and Twitter profile in an information page

apps.title: Rec Room: Play with Friends
apps.description:
Rec Room – The Ultimate Sandbox for Creativity & Fun!



Rec Room is the craziest and coolest sandbox game where EVERYONE can create! Rec Room is perfect for anyone looking to craft and refine their skills to make something one-of-a-kind! Whether you're new to making games or a seasoned creator, Rec Room makes designing and playing your own games easy, social, and FUN for everyone!



Build Games & More – Solo or with Friends



Jump into an immersive social experience where you can create alongside friends from around the globe. Collaborate on your own games and design unique hangout spaces, all with easy-to-use tools! Creation in Rec Room is real-time, which means you and your friends can work together seamlessly to bring your ideas to life. 



Publish & Play – Instantly



Press ‘Publish’ and watch your creations go live across all devices, from VR to mobile - instantly available for a global audience to enjoy. Make an action-packed multiplayer PVP game, a spooky horror escape room, or just a chill place to hangout with friends. Whatever you create, there’s an engaged community of players and creators waiting to jump in and check it out.



Express Your Creativity With No Limits



From designing your avatar’s perfect outfit to customizing your own dorm room to 3D modeling and building entire games, there’s no limit to what you can create. Use Rec Room’s powerful in-game tools to bring your dream project to life. Level up your creation skills with simple tutorials, live classes, and building clubs so that you can create anything you want!



Create Anytime, Anywhere 



Whether you're on a VR headset, PC, console, or mobile, Rec Room gives you seamless cross-platform building — no pro skills or external software needed! Full voice-chat and cross-play make creating and playing with friends on different devices a breeze.  



Find Your Audience & Earn Rewards!



Showcase your work, monetize your creations, and grow a fanbase! Whether you're designing custom avatar items & games, founding a club, hosting live events, or just hanging out and making friends - Rec Room gives you the tools to turn creativity into endless possibilities.



Join the most welcoming creative community and start your creator journey today! 

iOS Compatibility

iPhone: Rec Room is optimized for iPhone 7 Plus, 8 Plus, iPhone X and newer.

iPad: Rec Room is optimized for iPad Pro 11-inch, Pro 12.9-inch, Mini 5th generation and newer and iPad Air 3rd generation and newer.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We update the game routinely to improve user experience. This version includes minor improvements and bug fixes.

apps.title: REN|AI
apps.description:
REN|AI — Stop Dreaming. Start Creating.

You have ideas worth bringing to life. REN|AI helps you move beyond overthinking and into effortless creation. Built for creators, writers, and thinkers who want to turn inspiration into action, REN|AI combines design and intelligence to help you focus on what matters, creating.

REN|AI organizes your thoughts so you don’t have to. Every note, idea, and insight is structured intuitively, allowing your mind to stay clear and your creativity to stay uninterrupted. With improved AI insights and a beautifully fluid interface, you can move seamlessly from concept to completion without the usual chaos.

Whether you’re online or offline, brainstorming or refining, REN|AI adapts to your rhythm—helping you capture, shape, and bring your ideas to life effortlessly.

Stop waiting for the perfect moment.
Stop dreaming. Start creating

Legal: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://www.iaso.dev/renai

raw_data.releaseNotes:
REN|AI 1.1 — Stop Dreaming. Start Creating.

REN|AI’s 1.1 update brings new changes to help you stop dreaming and start creating. We’ve refined the experience to make your creative flow faster, smarter, and more intuitive.

What’s New:

- Search Functionality for Notes – Quickly find the ideas that matter most.
- Dark Mode (for Basic & Pro subscribers) – Create comfortably, day or night.
- Improved AI Insights – Smarter, more relevant suggestions to supercharge your work.
- Liquid Glass Navigation Bar – A sleek, modern design that feels as smooth as it looks.
- Auto Login – Jump right back into your workspace instantly.
- Offline Mode – Keep creating even without an internet connection (non-AI features).
- Editable Note Titles – Rename, refine, and stay organized with ease.
- Enhanced Toolbar – Cleaner controls for a smoother creative experience.

This update focuses on clarity, creativity, and control — giving you everything you need to turn inspiration into action.

REN|AI organizes your thoughts so you don’t have to. Every note, idea, and insight is structured intuitively, allowing your mind to stay clear and your creativity to stay uninterrupted. With improved AI insights and a beautifully fluid interface, you can move seamlessly from concept to completion without the usual chaos.

Whether you’re online or offline, brainstorming or refining, REN|AI adapts to your rhythm—helping you capture, shape, and bring your ideas to life effortlessly.

Stop waiting for the perfect moment.
Stop dreaming. Start creating

apps.title: True Natured Creatives
apps.description:
True Natured Creatives helps busy, creative people overcome creative block, imposter syndrome, self-doubt and overwhelm so they can embrace their true-natured creative potential and re-experience the joy of making. Practices explore art-based mindfulness, a unique fusion of art therapy, positive psychology, yoga philosophy, and trauma-informed neuroscience. You’ll get practice guidebooks, brief audio meditations, art journal prompts, goal tracking, and more. Installing the app is free of charge.

INFORMATION ABOUT THE APP

By signing up, you will get access to subscription(s) that include features such as progress tracking, and offline sync, available to subscribe free of charge.

The download of True Natured Creatives is free of charge.

apps.title: Mind Notes - Creative Thinking
apps.description:
In Mind Notes, you can discuss with yourself. You will see two projections of your mind. One is "Positive" that expresses your natural feelings. The other is "Negative", a little suspicious and asks a lot of questions. It will also suggest alternatives.

You may find it strange to have an interactive discussion even though you are alone. However, some research has shown that this allows us to accurately recognize and deeply understand the facts.
Putting your feelings into words also helps to enhance your empathy and imagination.

"It is not enough to have a good mind. The main thing is to use it well."
Rene Descartes

Thinking is becoming more and more important at this time of suffering.
We hope Mind Notes will help you change the world better.

apps.title: Outtakes
apps.description:
Introducing Outtakes, the Generative AI Dream Machine. Our cutting-edge AI image generator is designed to help unleash your creativity and explore new levels of imagination.

With Outtakes, you can transform simple prompts into stunning visual creations using advanced AI technology. Our creative AI runs entirely on your device, making it more accessible and user-friendly than ever before.

Explore the vast possibilities of your own creativity and let your imagination run wild. With Outtakes, you can create anything from beautiful desert oases to a herd of zebras in Times Square, or even a skier doing a 360 on an endless field of candy. The only limit is your own imagination.

• Advanced AI technology that generates stunning visuals in seconds
• An easy-to-use interface that makes creating and sharing your ideas simple
• Negative prompts which allow you to define what you don't want to see in your creations
• Powerful built-in sharing options to help you share your creations with the world
• A vibrant community of like-minded creatives to connect with on the Outtakes feed

Best of all, Outtakes is completely free. It runs on your own device giving you full control.

Join us as we usher in a new era of creativity.  Download Outtakes today and unleash your imagination like never before.

apps.title: Zentangle Mosaic
apps.description:
Become part of the world’s largest Zentangle Mosaic! 
 
Rick Roberts and Maria Thomas, the founders of the Zentangle® Method, created this app so you can log and organize your Zentangle creations and then share them with our nurturing and inspiring community of Zentangle enthusiasts across this planet. 
 
The Zentangle Method is an easy to learn, relaxing, and fun way to create beautiful images by drawing structured patterns. It increases focus and creativity, provides artistic satisfaction along with an increased sense of personal well-being. 
 
The Zentangle Method is enjoyed all over this world across a wide range of skills, interests and ages. Both artist and those who thought they were not can tap into an exciting new creative world. 
 
Zentangle Mosaic Subscriptions
 
The app is free to sign up and can be used with limited viewing abilities. Access to the full options can be gained by subscribing to the app.
Subscribers to Zentangle Mosaic will enjoy the following functionality: 
   •  Ability to upload tiles and create mosaics  
   •  Appreciate other users and tiles 
   •  Comment on tiles and mosaics 
   •  Access to “Tangles, Tips and Techniques,” “Kitchen Table Tangles,” and “Tangle Step Outs” 
   •  View tiles at high resolution 
 
Monthly Subscription: 
Time period: 30 (thirty) calendar days
Price of Subscription: $2.99

Yearly Subscription
Time Period: 1 (one) calendar year. [Note: Subscriptions initiated on February 29 of a leap year will auto-renew per the terms on February 28 of the subsequent year.]
Price of Subscription: $24.99

   •  Payment will be charged to te iTunes Account on confirmation of purchase 
   •  Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
   •  Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. The renewal cost of a Monthly subscription is $2.99. The renewal cost of a yearly Subscription is $24.99. 
   •  You can manage your subscription and turn off the auto-renewal by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. 
   •  You can cancel the auto-renewal of your subscription, but you cannot cancel the currently active subscription period. 
   •  Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 
   •  Privacy Policy: https://www.zentangle.com/mosaic/privacypolicy
   •  Terms of Use: https://www.zentangle.com/mosaic/terms-of-use

apps.title: TicTacToe Innovation.
apps.description:
Are you ready to revolutionize your organization's approach to innovation? Look no further! TicTacToe Innovation offers a comprehensive suite of services designed to elevate your company's innovation culture and propel you towards success.

With our three fundamental capabilities—Mindset & Culture, Discipline, and People & Processes—we empower organizations to unlock their full creative potential. Innovation thrives when we connect seemingly unrelated elements, and we're here to help you make those vital connections.

Here's what we offer:

1. Assessment: Wondering where your organization stands on its innovation journey? Our initial assessment identifies strengths and opportunities, paving the way for tailored actions and recommendations.

2. Challenge Definition: Together, we define the challenges based on assessment findings, ensuring a clear and focused approach.

3. Strategy Development: Dive into our Human-Centered Creativity and Innovation Mindset Workshop, crafted to tackle identified challenges and craft strategic action plans using our A.S.K(TM) Model.

4. Strategy Execution: Receive ongoing guidance and support as you implement your strategic plan, ensuring smooth execution and maximum impact.

Our Services:

1. Transformative Culture: Cultivate a culture of creativity and engagement, driving successful innovation across your organization.

2. Acceleration: Maximize the impact of each innovation, accelerating your journey towards success.

3. Innovation Platforms: Identify and harness innovation platforms, transforming them into leading innovation pipelines.

4. Assessment & Training: Kickstart your innovation journey with an initial organizational assessment, guiding actions and building lasting capabilities.

Don't settle for mediocrity—ignite your innovation engine with TicTacToe Innovation today! Download now and embark on a journey towards limitless creativity and success."
